title: "Ministry of Jesus to Troubled Disciples." Ch. 14 (Keswick Convention 1973)
description: In CHAPTER 14, the Lord is instructing the disciples in the secret of knowing the peace of God in days of crisis and perplexity.

title: "The Disciples' Relationship with Jesus, the Father & Each Other." Ch. 15 (Keswick Convention 1973)
description: In CHAPTER 15 verses 1-17, the Lord is instructing the disciples concerning their relationship with Him, with the Father, and with each other.

title: "The Great High Priestly Prayer" Ch. 17 (Keswick Convention 1973)
description: In CHAPTER 17, the Lord is in prayer before His Father, concerning Himself (vv.1-5), His disciples (vv. 6-19), and future believers in the Church Universal (vv. 20-26).

title: "The World, The Disciples and the Holy Spirit." Ch. 15:18-16:33 (Keswick Convention 1973)
description: In CHAPTER 15 v. 18-CHAPTER 16 v. 33, the Lord is instructing His disciples concerning their relationship with the world, and concerning the ministry of the Holy Spirit.

title: In The Shadow Of The Cross - Jesus Prays for His Disciples (1)
In The Shadow Of The Cross - Jesus Prays for His Disciples (2)
